div.class: banner banner--v3 banner--full-width banner--dark-background banner--center banner-height-desktop--300dp banner-height-tablet--150dp banner-height-mobile--100dp

img.alt: LinkedIn Talent Blog

div.p: Tips, strategies, and inspiration to help you hire and develop talent

div.a: CHRO Case Studies: Leading from the Front
div.p: LinkedIn’s brand-new look at HR innovation, CHRO Case Studies: Leading from the Front, examines how five companies are reimagining the world of work.

p.class: featured-post__author featured-post__author--no-date t-14 t-sans t-bold t-black

div.h3: How are talent professionals adapting to AI?
div.div: Find our AI content — from strategy and upskilling to prompt writing and product tips — here.

img.alt: Hiring nurses and other clinical professionals is flat-out hard. And getting harder. A new report from LinkedIn is loaded with tactics to make it easier.

div.a: New LinkedIn Report Reveals the Anatomy of Healthcare Hiring S...

li.p: Hiring nurses and other clinical professionals is flat-out hard. And getting harder. A new report from LinkedIn is loaded with tactics to make it easier.

img.alt: Talent pros can expand their influence by guiding executives to understand how career development helps organizations build and retain critical talent.

div.a: How to Be a Champion for the Business Value of Career Development

li.p: Talent pros can expand their influence by guiding executives to understand how career development helps organizations build and retain critical talent.

img.alt: According to industry leader Bonnie Dilber, here are 5 ways that AI will change recruiting in the next six months.

div.a: How AI Will Change Recruiting in the Next 6 Months

li.p: According to industry leader Bonnie Dilber, here are 5 ways that AI will change recruiting in the next six months.

div.class: banner banner--v3 banner--content-width banner--light-background banner--left banner-height-desktop--default banner-height-tablet--350dp banner-height-mobile--250dp

img.alt: Subscribe to the LinkedIn Talent Blog's newsletter.

div.p: Don't miss a story from the Talent Blog

img.alt: Learn more about LinkedIn's new AI-powered role play tool that can help support manager development during midyear review cycles.

div.a: How AI-Powered Role Play Helps Managers Show Up Stronger

li.p: Learn more about LinkedIn's new AI-powered role play tool that can help support manager development during midyear review cycles.

img.alt: Discover LinkedIn’s AI Academy for Talent Professionals — your go-to hub for mastering AI in hiring, no matter your role or readiness level.

div.a: The AI Academy for Talent Professionals Is Live

li.p: Discover LinkedIn’s AI Academy for Talent Professionals — your go-to hub for mastering AI in hiring, no matter your role or readiness level.

img.alt: Learn proactive strategies to build a resilient healthcare talent pipeline and engage top talent before staffing shortages impact patient care.

div.a: How to Build a Resilient Talent Pipeline in Healthcare

li.p: Learn proactive strategies to build a resilient healthcare talent pipeline and engage top talent before staffing shortages impact patient care.

img.alt: Learn how to build an effective talent architecture that works. Talent leader Julie Lyons reveals common roadblocks and proven solutions to overcome them.

div.a: 3 Talent Architecture Roadblocks I’ve Faced — and How to Overc...

li.p: Learn how to build an effective talent architecture that works. Talent leader Julie Lyons reveals common roadblocks and proven solutions to overcome them.

img.alt: Global staffing firm AMS has embraced AI-powered search and messaging tools to drive better candidate engagement and experience and higher quality long lists.

div.a: How AMS Is Redefining Hiring Efficiency with LinkedIn’s AI

li.p: Global staffing firm AMS has embraced AI-powered search and messaging tools to drive better candidate engagement and experience and higher quality long lists.

img.alt: To help talent leaders and recruiters better understand the competitive talent landscape, here's an updated list of the most in-demand jobs.

div.a: The Most In-Demand Jobs on LinkedIn Right Now

li.p: To help talent leaders and recruiters better understand the competitive talent landscape, here's an updated list of the most in-demand jobs.

img.alt: A new report from the OECD, backed with LinkedIn data, shows the business case for skills-based hiring and why this approach could give companies a competitive advantage.

div.a: LinkedIn Data: The Business Case for Skills-First Hiring

li.p: A new report from the OECD, backed with LinkedIn data, shows the business case for skills-based hiring and why this approach could give companies a competitive advantage.

img.alt: Too many companies hire the candidate who delivers the best “performance” in their interviews. Here’s how to hire the one who is the best fit for the job.

div.a: Hiring Is Broken: How to Disrupt the Dysfunction

li.p: Too many companies hire the candidate who delivers the best “performance” in their interviews. Here’s how to hire the one who is the best fit for the job.

img.alt: Hiring effectively and onboarding thoughtfully are critical to the growth of small businesses. Here’s how to do both smartly and power your company to success.

div.a: From Search to Start: A Guide to Your Next Great Hire

li.p: Hiring effectively and onboarding thoughtfully are critical to the growth of small businesses. Here’s how to do both smartly and power your company to success.

img.alt: Senior recruiter Cesar Cruz has embraced LinkedIn’s Hiring Assistant as a way to get more done and make time for high-value tasks. Watch a video of Cesar’s day.

div.a: LinkedIn Hiring Assistant: A Day in the Life of an AI-Powered ...

li.p: Senior recruiter Cesar Cruz has embraced LinkedIn’s Hiring Assistant as a way to get more done and make time for high-value tasks. Watch a video of Cesar’s day.

img.alt: If you’re trying to hire hourly workers today without an automated, AI-driven process, you’re losing candidates. Automation is not just coming. It’s here.

div.a: Want to See the Future of Talent Acquisition? Look to Hourly H...

li.p: If you’re trying to hire hourly workers today without an automated, AI-driven process, you’re losing candidates. Automation is not just coming. It’s here.

img.alt: The correct response to an L&D raining request is neither “yes” nor “no.” The right thing is to understand the pain point and help deliver a solution to that.

div.a: Don’t Say 'Yes' or 'No' to Training Requests. Do This Instead

li.p: The correct response to an L&D raining request is neither “yes” nor “no.” The right thing is to understand the pain point and help deliver a solution to that.
